website_summaries.verdict: An L-shaped desk with a tempered glass surface that is far cheaper than its competitors.
pros: A smaller desk that can still support two monitors
Assembly is straightforward, and the glass surface is sleek
We love this desk as an affordable option for gamers
cons: Some customers noted that the glass surface is fragile and the desk has a slight wobble

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk but one problem...
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were very clear which made the desk really easy to assemble. It also fits perfectly in the corner of my bedroom. I read that the weight was 50lbs so I shouldn’t have any problems with dual monitors. I’m only giving it 4 stars because one of the legs had rust on the corner so I’m not sure what happened there. Other than that, I think it’s a nice desk.
customer_reviews.author: LaShawn

customer_reviews.title: Great 5-star purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Could not be happier with my new desk. Light weight, well packaged. I'm older and able to lift it. Assembles easily - seriously if I can assemble it, anyone can. Little narrower than I need since I like to spread out when I work. However, it is well made, sturdy. I have two large dogs that crawl in and out, and it stays in place. Nice to look at. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough that it doesn't collapse when my 27 lb
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy enough that it doesn't collapse when my 27 lb. Maine Coon cat jumps up for a head scratch (and is immediately yelled ***DOWN***). Roomy enough for all the stuff that somehow accumulates over the course of the day. Easy to clean of coffee drips, bagel crumbs, and other food detritus. Easy to assemble -- at least according to my wonderful grandson who did the actual work. In other words, I'm very happy -- and comfortable -- with my 'out-of-the-way' corner desk and will not pester you with any complaints for a few years at least.
customer_reviews.author: J. SEWELL

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk!
customer_reviews.text: This desk is very nice. It took less than an hour to assemble. The instructions are easy and straight-forward....just pictures, letters for the parts and numbers to follow. Be careful to follow the instructions of making sure NOT to tighten the screws all the way until you have lightly screwed them all in. Once the screws are in place, then tighten them. Also, be careful with the glass tops. They are thin, but they do feel of good quality. I bought the desk for my teenage son’s gaming/streaming and he LOVES it. I love it too. I might get one for myself. The price was good for this desk.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Reviews are correct
customer_reviews.text: This desk is amazing. Extremely spacious and sturdy (does not wobble in the slightest). Maximizes work space while still fitting into small areas. Easy assembly, no tools required. Price point great!
customer_reviews.author: Analytical VTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Desk is bigger than I thought - perfect
customer_reviews.text: Desk is perfect for dual monitor gaming system set up on one side and study area on the other. Holds more than the suggested 25 lbs. Sturdier than I expected too. I've knocked into the table several times and it doesn't jostle enough to where things fall off. Con: Glass pieces were hard to install; holes did not align. :\ And I had to use a small hammer to bang out some parts so that it'd fit together like intended. Nothing worth returning the desk over. Desk is easy enough to move and assemble by yourself.
customer_reviews.author: candyman

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: Excuses, my office. I'll be quick i great buy seems like its a great quality. Fast shipping just so you know they don't wrap it or anything so there will be the big box at your door I felt sorry for my mail lady.... with COVID19 and everything working from home is the way of life now... this here has made it so much easier... i have enough room to have my work stuff and school stuff all on one desk.... if your good or not good with putting things together this was easy... just follow the directions dont need any tools it comes with everything... not a traditional desk but it works in my space.....
customer_reviews.author: TJ CASEY

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I will be working from home starting next week so I’ve purchaed this L-shaped desk. It was easy to assemble but towards the end, I noticed that it was missing one of the glasses. There was no way for me to use this desk without the top glass :( So I had to return this desk and now I need to find something tomorrow; this made things pretty difficult for me as I will need a desk by end of this week.
customer_reviews.author: Prime VVIP consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great desk if you need a little more space.
customer_reviews.text: Great value. By the way, there is some question of the weight capacity of this desk. The center part holds 25lb and each long portion holds 50lb. That should be enough for most purposes. Looks really sharp and gives my son one space for his computer, and another for written work. Plenty of legroom, and the desk looks really sharp. There is just room between the glass and the frame to put zip ties through, which makes for great cable management. I recomend help to put it together, if just for when the time come to turn it right side up.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Fitzmaurice

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The desk is fairly nice for the price that it was, the supports limit leg room if your monitors are in the center like mine but its a give and take. Wasnt very easy to assemble tho, some of the screws arent very accessable at certain points. The desk has a bit of wobble on carpet but once it settles and the feet are adjusted the wobble is fairly minimal.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Condon

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that I was able to put this desk together without help. I’m usually terrible at assembling furniture that comes in pieces like this did. what I loved was that when I had one piece backwards, I didn’t have to take the WHOLE thing apart and start over. I could just remove that one piece and fix it, kept the rest intact. It looks good, love the opaque glass. Was a little wobbly when I moved it to its final spot, but once it was settled it feels sturdy now. Just doesn’t move well.
customer_reviews.author: Scikatie

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: This desk was sent to me with the wrong manual. However customer service was very quick about emailing me the correct manual - on a Sunday. Had it not been for this one error, I would have given this product five stars. The desk is a great value. I love bang for my buck, and this desk has that. Very elegant looking for casual light use. Assembly was long, but the directions we're really good so I didn't have trouble understanding what to do - I'm not used to using tools!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jacobski

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and damaged out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy, I ordered two only received one and it was damaged. There is no damage to the outside of the box, the inner packaging was good and plenty for what was shipped. This damage had to happen before it was boxed. A large dent with no evidence of damage on the styrofoam or outer cardboard. Much smaller than you think, perfect for a student but not for an office setting, hardly enough room on the desktop for your monitor and keyboard. Writing to the company to see if I can get replacement legs instead of returning and waiting weeks to get another desk. They are needed for short term and will work for now.
customer_reviews.author: JC Fultz

customer_reviews.title: Not for gaming
customer_reviews.text: It was easy enough to assemble for anyone with a semi-mechanical mind. The overall quality is pretty low. The metal stand is like the thickness of a metal straw, and the glass is about beer bottle thick. I wouldn't recommend this for any real hard gaming. As a taller person I have almost no leg room with a regular sized desk chair. I'm gonna use it as a drawing desk. But if you're considering using it for gaming I would look for something a bit more substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Business-y
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for me to work from home a few days a week and I love it. It does it's job but with all the glass I feel nervous to do too much on it or put too much weight on it. It was fairly easy to assemble. I almost did it by myself but then my wife helped because I did it wrong and got frustrated. The only issue with assembly is that you need more space than the actual size of the desk because you have to flip it twice.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey L Williamson

customer_reviews.title: The desk itself is very nice, looks very nice and everything seems to be ...
customer_reviews.text: The desk itself is very nice, looks very nice and everything seems to be of good quality. The only downside is the size, I wish the desk was a little bit bigger. My laptop fits fine by itself but I have a monitor and a keyboard that makes the desk a little tight. 19" deep is not enough, but this is my fault for when I ordered it. Everything is is good
customer_reviews.author: John Y.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well  made (A steal for the price)
customer_reviews.text: The desk was beautiful and easy to assemble! I saw some reviews about the screw holes on the glass bit being off centered, but I didnt have any such issue. One of the legs had a minor scratch, but I am 100% sure that it is from the carrier hitting the box while carrying it up the stairs (I know because the box had a dent in the area). Other than that, everything was perfect and the glass was intact and well packaged. Other reviews that say the glass was damaged is certainly due to the carrier's fault during delivery since the glass is layered with styrofoam, cardboard, and non-scratch sheets. I am buying another for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: Altieri

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Black Glass Desk
customer_reviews.text: This desk is just as I expected it would be. Everything needed for assembly was included. Was thinking I would just lay the glass in place w/o screws, DON'T TRY IT. The glass kept jumping out & did not lay flat. Had to flip desk over, loosen screws, place glass, screw glass in place, then tighten desk screws back. It was worth the effort. This is a beautiful desk.
customer_reviews.author: My reviews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect desk for a simple setup!
customer_reviews.text: I had some issues right off the bat. The instructions that came with it were for a completely different desk. I had to build the desk based on what the picture looked like. The desk's top is made out of tempered glass and claims to not place anything over 50lbs on each panel. It doesn't appear to be a terrible desk and reading some of the reviews, I was almost hesitant to buy this specific desk, but figured I'd give it a try and it's pretty great so far. However, I think I might upgrade to better desk at some point since.
customer_reviews.author: ImKrazyK

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great desk. I would consider medium sized. Only issue for me is when sitting in the corner my legs hit the posts very easily. Other than that easy to put together. Clear instructions. Product arrived undamaged. Black Glass top smudges easily so prepare to clean somewhat frequently. love it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan M

customer_reviews.title: Good desk for gaming setup
customer_reviews.text: Great desk! I used it for my gaming computer setup and it fit everything nicely. I will say it’s not the most stable on carpet, but once you put your stuff on it that doesn’t factor in. It is easy to assemble but the glass tops can be annoying to screw in if your frame isn’t completely tightened (I made sure everything was in the right place before tightening all the screws as they get stripped fairly easily when you remove and reapply them) all in all solid desk.
customer_reviews.author: Mai Dror

customer_reviews.title: The finish product is sturdy and I am pleased with the final product
customer_reviews.text: This desk looks just as pictured once put together. The setup did take around a hour, but the assembly can be completed by someone with little to no experience. The finish product is sturdy and I am pleased with the final product. I recommend this desk for anyone needing a light, modern desk for an office area. One tip, ensure you position the pieces correctly and do NOT tighten until all screws are in place. This will throw the alignment off if not done for the glass and the bars underneath. Great desk for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The desk arrived on time and the set was complete and without damage. The assembly instructions were simple and easy to follow. I have a desk now that fits nicely into the area that I planned for. Prior to committing to this purchased, I went to Office Depot and to Big Lots to see what was available there. I was sorely disappointed with both choice and price. I am happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John A Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a fair desk for a fair price. Not super sturdy (easy to bump and it will move a bit) but solid. I scratched it a bit when assembling, so word of advice, assemble on a rug or something. Also, it was quite simple to put together. Just make sure you read the instructions and pay attention to the pictures. Only real let down is that the glass screw sections didn’t line up 100% with the desk spaces. Out of 8 spots to screw (I think), only about 4 actually aligned for me to put the screws in. All in all, I don’t regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Erica P

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for a budget
customer_reviews.text: Overall its pretty good buy. I was in desperate need of a work desk since I now work remotely but had budget. fits everything on my desk & was easy to put together. Only downside is I feel it's on the cheaper side but then again you get what you pay for. It works & i am happy
customer_reviews.author: Hilary

customer_reviews.title: Love the finished product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this desk. It fit right where I wanted it like it was made for the spot and wasn't too bad to put together. My one complaint putting it together was that the allen wrench did not hold up well on some of the tightening. It stripped easily and had to use one from my tool box to finish the job.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Good for Laptop Setup
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a college student. Be warned, the glass is pretty thin but sturdy enough for a laptop setup. If you want to put something heavy on it, I suggest against it despite the claim of it holding 50 lbs for the table and 25 lbs for the corner. Risks of shattering the glass is pretty nerve racking.
customer_reviews.author: Rin

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for your buck--love the desk
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my new desk! Product was exactly as described, very well packaged (perfectly fine, despite the box being a little banged up in shipping), and easier to assemble than I had anticipated. The instructions were relatively easy to follow (in my opinion, easier than IKEA furniture) and all of the parts were clearly labeled/individually packaged to make everything a breeze. If you're looking for a desk and on a budget like I was, this is definitely worth your money! **the only thing to note, the middle panel isn't actually 'secured' but rather just rests on top. My super fat kitty walks all over it and is has never so much as jiggled, so it's sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome desk, easy to assemble and great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome desk! I was updating my son's learning area and ordered your desk. He does online school and I needed to redo his learning area as he has outgrown his little desk from the previous 2 years..From start(opening the box) to finish, I put it together by myself in under an hour. Its wonderful all parts and hardware were there, everything was perfect. Beautiful desk for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: merry C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: The metal frame is relatively easy is assemble. Of the three pieces of glass top, the long pieces each have four fittings glued to them. You put screws into these fittings. The corner piece of glass simply rests in the frame. I put the whole thing together in a room where my wife was taking a nap and I didn't disturb her. She uses one side, I the other. Sturdy. Elegant.
customer_reviews.author: SLS

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Sleek.
customer_reviews.text: I adore this desk. It is steel and tempered glass. Not a piece of pressboard in the box. It took me 30 minutes to assemble, and the instructions were exceedingly clear. It looks spectacular in my view. It is sturdy, looks sleek and tasteful. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Weezie Adams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk with instructions misprint
customer_reviews.text: This desk is absolutely wonderful. It is very sturdy and provides a lot of room. It went together very easily except for one major flaw: the instructions have the screws mislabeled. The bag shows screws J and K (J is long and K is short), but the instruction book uses I and J. This issue should really be fixed quickly. This would be a five star review if the instructions were accurately labeled.
customer_reviews.author: MathMagician

customer_reviews.title: My favorite desk!!!
customer_reviews.text: My FAVORITE desk ever!!!!! It was a little tricky to get the glass to set in the frame once I set it up, because the frame seemed to be slightly uneven, but I got it to fit in and it seemed to even things out! Ive had zero problems since I purchased it last summer of 2019 and I just love the space of this desk!
customer_reviews.author: Navi

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Kinda wobbley, but that might be because I have it on a rug. I have another desk on the rug and it's not wobbley though. Overall, I absolutely love the desk. It fits my dual screen desktop and a laptop and still has room for my computer accessories. I love the glass and its a really nice desk for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. N.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: What more could you ask for? Easy to put together (really easy!), stable, looks good with the dark glass, quality metal braces, and perfect corner desk size. Bought two of them for each of my kids bedroom. The only drawback is that you will need to find a good cord-hiding solution as everything shows up underneath and around the desk. But you would know that before you purchased because it's clearly shown in the pictures that cords will show.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Bratina

customer_reviews.title: Missing Parts
customer_reviews.text: Package delivered with missing parts; x2 Glide pieces & the Corner Top Glass. ****Update: A representative contacted be less than 24 hours to apologize for the inconvenience. He gave me options to choose from to rectify the matter. I choose to have a redelivery of the product & delivery came 4 days later! Product fits perfectly & I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I discovered one of the pieces was manufactured incorrectly with the prongs to hold one of the panels facing on the outside instead of the inside. I called the company to see if a piece could be sent to me without replacing the entire unit. I've called the company several times and they have yet to respond or send an email. The desk seems like it would have been an okay product had it been made properly, but I'll never know.
customer_reviews.author: jclark13

customer_reviews.title: Great desk!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this desk for our son who need more desk space for his computer, TV and gaming system but not a huge space. This worked perfect! He still has room to do paperwork even. It was super easy to assemble and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharilyn Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: Not the strongest.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad, just don't plan on putting anything heavy on it. I originally got it for me but wasn't near sturdy enough for my printer. Now, mind you, mine is a lil bigger then most, but just be careful. Wound up being perfect for my daughter tho
customer_reviews.author: robert b.

customer_reviews.title: OK for light home use....certainly not commercial grade. Flaw in manufacturing.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly instructions to follow and comes with tool. Was going along fine assembling until one of the part D inner frame fastener holes doesn't line up with part E corner frame holes so could only put in one of the two fasteners, The desk wiggles and the fasteners are tight....not sure if it's due to one less screw. You get what you pay for. Also arrived two days late due to UPS shipping delay.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy b

customer_reviews.title: Simple, functional, cost effective computer desk
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good, simple corner desk. The glass paneling adds a touch of modern to it and the frame is designed to allow for maximum leg room and placement of items under the top while not reducing your ability to scoot your office chair up under it.
customer_reviews.author: krisCross

customer_reviews.title: Le Crozz is the BEST!!!
customer_reviews.text: Impressive! I received my order and one of the glass tables was broken, within 2 hours, I got an email and confirmation of a new shelf....NICE! When a NEW box came I was abruptly shocked and extremely satisfied. Rarely do you see such great, phenomenal customer service, Le Crozz is a company to trust and rely on, just like Amazon. Le Crozz customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Garyfromboston

customer_reviews.title: Glass top L shape.
customer_reviews.text: Received this desk today 7/13/2020. I started working from home and needed a designated work area. I saw this desk for $94ish wasn’t a bad price and really wanted a glass top L shape desk. Overall 3 stars: It does have a few dings/ dints. Visible. Similar to the other comments a lot of the holes aren’t aligned. Little shaky. Not sturdy. Won’t recommend overloading this desk. Very minimal decor and necessities. Overall good product, hopefully it lasts and serve its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: After having the desk for about 2 months I have noticed some things that are questionable. When building the desk I noticed one of the screws and sockets did not line up at the very end of the build. The desk wobbles (not due to screw issue before) and the desk is very prone to finger prints (not surprising due to the glass top) Overall the desk is fine and for the price you pay it's definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this piece
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk to use as a makeup and hair vanity. The glass and metal are very easy to clean. It’s very sturdy for such a simple design. I did have issues when setting up because a few parts are easy to flip backwards and attach and I didn’t realize till I was almost done! Lol I had to take it apart and reassemble. The good news is it’s easy to take apart and reassemble for moving if ever needed!
customer_reviews.author: Larrah

customer_reviews.title: He now can comfortably study on his desk
customer_reviews.text: The right size and cozy looking to fit in my high schooler’s small room in the corner. He now can comfortably study on his desk, on side with the computer and the other side with his books and paper. Only wish it had a couple of drawers or some sorting of mechanisms to attach some drawers to put pencils etc
customer_reviews.author: J. Li

customer_reviews.title: Good L shape desk
customer_reviews.text: I've had this desk for a while now and i have to say it has surprised me. Now its not the best L shape desk you will find but its not bad either , ive had it for 4 months and it still ingood condition ,leg room is good , and the glass surface is strong , i though it was gonna crack in a few months but it has hold on for now. If tightened good , it doesent wobble that much. I have a 17 inch laptop , a 27 inch TV and switch and some other small stuff
customer_reviews.author: Alejandro Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Good for maybe children or small craft work
customer_reviews.text: The metal frames are not perfectly level and when screwing in the glass tops, at least one mounting point broke on each of the two desks I got. There's too much flex in the whole assembly for the glass to be screwed down in the manner that it was designed. Good for maybe children or small craft work? Measure your area, desk is not as deep/wide as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Ally

customer_reviews.title: Good size for limited room space
customer_reviews.text: This desk is for my son's room, it is good quality. aside from one hole not bored all the way through and was offset, which made assembly take a little longer. Gave 3 stars on assembly for this reason. Other than this, desk is nice and fits perfectly in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: Jo A.

customer_reviews.title: Came covered in scratches, not a sturdy desk
customer_reviews.text: The desk shakes as you type which is extremely distracting and makes me worry about my monitors on it. On top of that the black metal came covered in scratches so it already looks well worn and used which is annoying straight out of the box. I would not recommend purchasing. It looks nice over all but the function on it is not good.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Not the most sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I guess for the price I shouldn’t expect the best. This desk is just temporary so it’s fine for now. But my problem is that it isn’t sturdy at all’s it’s shaky and not the best. But it works so its fine
customer_reviews.author: Esmie

customer_reviews.title: Does not sit as high
customer_reviews.text: This desk does not sit as high and I would like it too, it sits pretty low so you would need to get rises if you want it to sit a little higher. I its a really nice desk and I try to keep it clutter free but it doesn't seem to work. It looks nice in my home office though.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Vonda

customer_reviews.title: Pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I feel pretty satisfied with my decision to get this. It’s definitely not the nicest or largest desk by any means, but it gets the job done at a pretty decent price. I only wish it was designed so a chair could fit in the center. The way it’s built, you’ll need to have your computer on one of the sides (not the center).
customer_reviews.author: DasKavaar

customer_reviews.title: Quality, but lifestyle dependent....
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, I love it! Sturdy for what I need it for, but if you have small children/large pets you might want something a little more durable. Perfect for college/work from home set up, but if you’re looking to set up multiple monitors, etc. you might want to look for something different. (Max weight on center piece is 25lbs & 50lbs on side panels.) I do wish there was a little more surface area, but it fits in my bedroom nicely, since I’m sharing apartment with roommates....
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Dowty

customer_reviews.title: Great for home office
customer_reviews.text: Bought this desk for an actual office space when we purchased our new home. Shipped in tact, easy assemble, great looks! The quality for the price point is excellent! I currently have two 22" monitors, one 17" laptop with dock and a keyboard/mouse on one side and into the corner piece. I leave the other side open for paper work. Plenty of room and durable enough to hold my equipment and withstand my occasional leaning on my elbows. Great overall! Would recommend to others looking for a stylish, sturdy desk for a home office.
customer_reviews.author: Craig S.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, looks great with the black glass and above all else, it is strong. It supports my full desktop with a monitor attached to a desk mounted monitor stand. I also have a mini fridge on it. Like a mini mini fridge, but it still holds a 6 pack and that's quite a bit more weight. Bottom line, you can trust it as long as you follow the simple assembly instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Maximilian Sahler

customer_reviews.title: durable, qualtiy and no legs in the corner to obstruct your sitting and swivel power
customer_reviews.text: I bought this desk because it swivels obstruction free, here is what I mean, if you are working on the right side of the desk and want to swing to the left side, you don't have legs or bars in the way, Super awesome design, ALSO, I always buy used and repackaged, I can't believe the quality of the used items, they come as new, seriously one said OK SHAPE and it was like new, out of original box. SO I'm a big fan of open items, ALWAYS, you'll love this desk,
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a gaming setup, I use multiple monitors, overall very satisfied. It's pretty sturdy, not amazingly sturdy, but i'm never worried about it falling or anything. Pretty easy to put together, probably took me about 20-30 mins. Only complaint is it was missing one of the rubber pieces the glass rests on. i took a small piece of cardboard and stuck it where the rubber was suppose to go and its fine. other than that, very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Atention
customer_reviews.text: I hope this message finds you well, the product I received is of very good quality, however, the glasses are too thin, second to install the holes do not fit in some entries that have the glasses are not square and sure they should place Something that protects all the glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Miguelangel

customer_reviews.title: If your thinking just pull the trigger!
customer_reviews.text: Love the desk great for the price! Ample leg room only thing is I wish it came with a desktop tray/stand for the floor due to weight restriction! Each side panel limit is 50lbs and the middle is only 25 so be careful if you have a beefy monitor! Other wise great desk def. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Jose Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great looking and good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great little desk, attractive, easy to put together and strong. Other feedback made me worry but I am so happy with it. Each side holds 50 lbs and the corner piece will hold 25 lbs. it clearly say so on the glass. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Charmvb1

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Simple to put together, lightweight. Had a hard time getting the glass tops screwed into place since some things didn't want to line up, but after a lot of sweating and swearing I finally got it.
customer_reviews.author: liivingdeadgirl

customer_reviews.title: Well made for cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Its better made then I thought I ordered the all black desk . Didnt read any of the description so i was suprised when I pulled three sheets of glass out of the box and it just took about 15 mins to put together. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper Payne

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for the price
customer_reviews.text: Assembly was a little difficult but only because I didn't read the directions thoroughly. Don't tighten all of the screws until you place the glass - really! Great desk, great price, very attractive and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley S. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Over all good
customer_reviews.text: The table is great only complaint is it's not as sturdy like you can barely push it and it moves a lot. I love the L-shade design makes more table space. Love the color. It's used for PC gaming. Probably would use it if your doing art work projects.
customer_reviews.author: lauryn e. smith

customer_reviews.title: You don't get what you pay for?
customer_reviews.text: get I am a firm believer that you get what you pay for. With this desk, that is not the case. I found it light weight which is great since I am not suppose to lift heavy items. It was super easy to assemble and the directions were easy to understand. It is a bit wobbly if you bump into it but it doesn't seem like it will collapse otherwise. For the price, it is well worth it. If you need a decent and reasonably priced desk, then this is the desk you need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put together. Not very stable
customer_reviews.text: The desk was extremely difficult as the instructions weren't clear nor were they concise. I have put together beds from Ikea, so I am not new to DIY. Then some of the parts were rusted near the legs, and some of the metal parts don't line up for the table top and are damaged. In addition to, the desk isn't exactly stable on carpet. I am considering sending the desk back.
customer_reviews.author: trmptjazz

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk.
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than expected. (yes I measured the area before I ordered.) Nice looking glass cover. ITook a while to get use to the one end leg. Every time I went to move and get up I would kick it. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk/work space- excellent price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, excellent price, extremely easy to follow instructions. The two main panels of glass are held on by bolts, while the corner glass is held on be suction cups. I’m not sure why it is designed that way, but it doesn’t seem to be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W. Adam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble (easier if two people so one can ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (easier if two people so one can hold the pieces). If one middle-aged woman and a 14 year old can do it, so can you! Only one piece did not line up exactly, but I was able to bend it in. Has held up 6 months being used by a teenager for gaming console, laptop, and TV.
customer_reviews.author: Stressed Out Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great piece for price point. Easy to assemble. Fits the room great and has a clean look. We have a gaming tower that lights up, it looks neat through the glass. The company was very easy to work.
customer_reviews.author: EGS

customer_reviews.title: STURDY STYLISH AND EASY  ASSEMBLISH!!!
customer_reviews.text: VERY PLEASED...IT TOOK ME HOURS...READING REVIEWS...TO PICK THIS ONE....BINGO!!! GREAT PRICE AND QUALITY...MY SISTERS HOUSE WARMING GIFT. IT TOOK TWO HEADS TO PUT IT TOGETHER . BUT ONE FOCUSED PERSON COULD HAVE DONE IT IN LESS TIME. PERFECT FIT FOR HER. IF YOU PLAN TO PUT HEAVY BOOKS, FEET UP OR HEAVIER THAN 25 POUNDS MATERIALS ON IT. DONT...OR BUY A WOOD ONE. THIS DESK IS MOSTLY FOR LAP TOP USER AND GAMERS WHO ARE NOT HARD ON GLASS TOP FURNITURE.
customer_reviews.author: WWEENetworkWellness

customer_reviews.title: Great product and cheapest price around
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, fits two large computer screens and leaves room for a printer scanner or just clear desk space for writing. The glass surface is easy to clean. This fits perfectly into the corner of our room and has been great for my pre teen child and virtual learning. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: charlyn Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed to set up a home office. I saw this and decided to give it a try. He loves it! It looks great, and is nice quality - especially for the price! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Great compact desk
customer_reviews.text: Incredible desk for the price. Just compact enough to fit in a small, semi cramped corner, but still plenty of room for a computer and a small shelf. I don't use the desk myself (my girlfriend does) but she has absolutely zero complaints. Easy to assemble, fits in spaces easily, and the price was so, so right.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Easy peasy and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Its so perfect and sleek for my room the glass is perfect easy assembly, I managed to put it all together by myself with my bottle of wine in under an hour!
customer_reviews.author: Christie iannucci

customer_reviews.title: This desk is beautiful and sleek looking
customer_reviews.text: This desk is beautiful and sleek looking. The price is fantastic and assembly was a snap. It would have recieved 5 stars from me except that it's really short. I'm 5'5 and I have to put my desk chair on the lowest rung to get my legs under it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Crapser

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it
customer_reviews.text: Arrived over a week early and was pretty easy to set up. Just make sure to look at the pictures of what it's supposed to look like on the ends to be certain the legs are facing the right direction. That was the only part that had me caught up. Otherwise it's a beautiful, sleek desk and goes perfectly in my beauty room/home office
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Rae

customer_reviews.title: Great desk for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this desk as I thought the price was too good and I had seen several complaints of the glass peices being broken. My desk arrived without any broken peices and went together smoothly (I followed the directions closely). It is a really great desk for a really low price.
customer_reviews.author: husker66

customer_reviews.title: nope it way smaller than pix BUT perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I was worried it was too wide or long...nope it way smaller than pix BUT perfect for me. Happy with this length. A bar was bent almost had to contact replacement...so seller pls be careful with that. Really pretty, great price, very happy with i...instructions were good!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel M.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and lots of room.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It is very sturdy and lots of room. She has a printer and 2 laptops and a place to put food and writing materials. It is very chic looking. There was one piece that gave us trouble it didn't match up. We very carefully played with it and it locked into place. Other then that very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Parrot

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk, fits in small rooms, little wobbly
customer_reviews.text: It's not a bad little desk. It fits nicely in my room, but I find myself withing it had a bit more depth to it. It is a little wobbly, but very easy to put together, almost to the point of being modify-able. I could see myself ordering another and combining the peices into one super desk
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure What Happened
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive my SHW L-Shaped Home Office Corner Desk and when I prepare to open the box, glass particles spilled from the loose corner of the box. Perhaps I should not have ordered the one made of glass. I request a refund. I have never had this experience before so it is a bit surprising. I still like the look of the desk....guess I will have to find it in a store somewhere....
customer_reviews.author: Marcus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Price, Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: 1. You need to assemble yourself. 2. Great desk with lots of room. 3. Easy to assemble. 4. You do not need any of your own tools to build the product. 5. The metal frame and tempered glass gives it a quality build feel and sturdiness. 6. Build instructions are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: SarahOnAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: The desk looks amazing and for the price it’s crazy good quality. I purchased a similar desk a few years back from office max for $300. There are a few negatives. 1 took a long time to assemble. Instructions were vague and didn’t help that much. 2 desk shakes. The shaking isn’t terrible but it could get annoying. Again for the price not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Joannah

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for - Cheap but looks good and pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned and had this desk assembled for a few days now. With everything setup, which isn’t much it seems easy to wobble but seems sturdy. Expect cheap wobbles which is what you pay for. The quality of the pieces fit together OK, but aren’t snug perfect. Also to speak to my picture I’ve included, they got really dang lazy with the labels for the pieces to build. Like I know it’s pretty obvious visually, but it’s pretty lazy when the letters are completely wrong...c’mon.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and great for what I need. I have my work and personal computers that both needed a home. There are a few things that I'm not happy with; there are no holes in the desk top to run wires through so they have to go behind the desk and there is no shelf or keyboard drawer. I can live with the issues but I would have preferred a place to run the wires.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Kotch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old decided to put it together, took him about 30 minutes. Got it for my 12/17 yr old and they fit comfortably in the space with 2 laptops.
customer_reviews.author: LisaN

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but middle glass needs screw in support
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy desk, 32 mins to unbox and assemble. The middle section of glass needs screw in support Just like the 2 rectangular sections simply because it keeps coming loose from the suction cups.
customer_reviews.author: nsc2848

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for real work use
customer_reviews.text: It needs to be stressed that the tops are tempered glass and you have to be careful not to hit your knees on the forward angled supports at the center.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the cost. Well constructed.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice desk. I bought it for my son who will be a freshman in high school this upcoming year. It is very well constructed. All of the parts were clearly labeled including all of the fasteners too, which made assembly quite smooth and easy. Only tool you need is included. It looks great, and I am strongly considering getting one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: vanman

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I got this item for school, as I definitely wanted a lot of space for books, notes, computer, etc. It really does the job and serves as a great desk to buy last minute. Assembly took a little longer than expected, but it was honestly worth it for how sleek the desk looks. Would definitely recommend for someone on a budget, for a gaming desk, or for your study needs!
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great desk
customer_reviews.text: Awesome desk! I expected it to be decent but it for sure is way better built then I thought it would be. All the way around even the bolts and the glass is nice and thick and alls very clean. Absolutely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Nulph

customer_reviews.title: It's Okay
customer_reviews.text: While using the desk, some weird sound occurred, pretty annoying... It is because this desk is too "soft." After releasing the screw not too tight, everything should be fine now...
customer_reviews.author: Jyun-Siang, Ynag

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install but glass moves easy. U need super glue for it
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to install. It took me probably 10 mins to install. Only downfall is the glass moves very easily. So i had to super glue them so its more stable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The desk itself was easy to build. Make sure you don’t put too heavy of items on it as the 2 main sides only support 50 lbs (22.68kg). Leg room isn’t a problem(for me). And it can take a pretty decent beating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well
customer_reviews.text: How Am I Supposed To Put This Together With The Wrong Instructions ? UPDATE!!!! After A Few Drinks Lol I Was Able To Put This Together Without The Instructions And It Was Pretty Easy
customer_reviews.author: Alonnasha Cowan

customer_reviews.title: Worth sitting behind!
customer_reviews.text: My son put a 42” tv on it and has plenty of room for his laptop. Went together quickly. Pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: T W

customer_reviews.title: Decent budget L desk
customer_reviews.text: pretty solid. assemble wasnt too hard. only problem was aligning the glass with the frame. had to re screw it 4 times and still not right but it seems to not bother it at all. very strudy too for a small frame
customer_reviews.author: Rashad

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to assemble, looks fantastic with the tempered glass and it has a weight limit so watch out for that. Overall Its a very nice L shape desk.
customer_reviews.author: Hung

product_meta.title: SHW L-Shape Corner Desk Computer Gaming Desk Table, Black
product_meta.description: SHW L-Shaped Home Office Corner Desk
feature_bullets: L-shaped 3 piece corner computer desk saves space in home office, dorm room
Material: steel frame, powder coated finish, tempered safety glass
Foot rest bar allows for more comfort, Adjustable glides stabilizes / balances the desk on uneven floors.
Assembly required, step-by-step instructions and hardwares included
Measures 51" W x 19" D x 28.5 " H (51" overall depth)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,742 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
